ygData.subject: Re: Grrrrrrrr!
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of which - they sure seem to have nerfed the range of bellows.  I don t pull a lot because I have a poor sense of direction - but did so for the first
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of which - they sure seem to have nerfed the range of bellows. I
don't pull a lot because I have a poor sense of direction - but did so for
the first time in ages Sunday night in Rathe Mtn - and it sure seemed that I
had to get a LOT closer to those Cyclops than I had to get to the Dervish's
way back when....

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 21, 1999 12:18 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Grrrrrrrr!


> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> More evidence that "bard hate" is alive and well - unfortunately it's the
> game designers and not monsters:
>
